message:
At the #IFA2017, Huawei unveiled the ultimate mobile assistant with the new Kirin 970. This October 16th in Munich, join us and experience the future of AI. 

#HuaweiMobileAI #TheRealAIPhone
Worth the wait #HuaweiMobileAI #HuaweiMate10

Beautiful, professional portraits of the people you love. With the dual-lens #LeicaCamera on the #HuaweiP10, you can take incredible shots. 

Took a portrait with your Huawei phone lately? Share them with us by tagging @huaweimobilesg on Instagram for a chance to be featured!

Get a larger than life experience with the new #HuaweiY7Prime! Unleash yourself with a smooth octa-core processor, outstanding low-light camera and long-lasting battery life. We've got you fam 😎

Hello Singapore! Huawei is looking for the next generation of photographers!
Join #HuaweiNEXTIMAGE Awards and showcase your best work to win $$CASH$$ USD$20,000! Visit http://bit.ly/2hkG8tZ for more details.

📸

📷 Shot with the Time-lapse mode on the #HuaweiP10.

Patriotism never looked more picturesque! With crystal clear photos like these shot on the #HuaweiP10, NDP feels like it was just yesterday!

✨ Heading out this long public holiday weekend? Share your photos with us or tag us on Instagram and stand a chance to be featured!

It's finally here — The Honor 8 Pro is now exclusively available on Lazada for just $599! Powered by a huge 4,000mAh capacity battery, a quad-HD display and 12MP rear dual-camera, it's a smartphone that's born for speed. 

Receive a free view cover casing (worth $46; while stocks last) and a 1-year warranty when you purchase it now. Get yours at http://po.st/ShopHonorSG.

Enable your App Twin feature on your device today to log into 2 WhatsApp and Facebook accounts at the same time! 

1. Settings > App Twin > Turn on the Facebook or WhatsApp switches as desired.

2. When Twin App is enabled, two app icons will appear on the home screen, allowing you log in two accounts at the same time.

3. Press and hold the App Twin icon to disable the feature.

4. Before you disable App Twin icon to disable App Twin or remove its icons from the home screen, back up account to avoid losing your data.

Learn more: http://po.st/ExploreP10Plus

Do you prefer an all-in-one off-screen navigation button or a virtual navigation bar? 

Set your preference on the #HuaweiP10 or #HuaweiP10Plus via Settings > Navigation Key.

Running multiple social media accounts? Say goodbye to the hassle of logging out with the exclusive Huawei App Twin feature that allows you to log into 2 WhatsApp and Facebook accounts on your device!

Go to Settings > App twin and start creating your dual login profile here.

#HuaweiMate9 #HuaweiP10 #HuaweiP10Plus #HuaweiSG
